preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 6 grams of boron powder (B). 2. Weigh out 1 gram of copper powder (Cu). 3. Weigh out 20 grams of nickel powder (Ni). 4. Weigh out 2 grams of antimony powder (Sb). 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 6. Use a mortar and pestle or a mechanical shaker to thoroughly mix the powders for at least 5 minutes until uniform.
